dict.acceptation: 使不同；使多样化；[音乐]变奏；

sent.orig: Prepress adopted country, the main trend also vary between countries vary.
sent.trans: 拔取印后技艺因国度而同，次要的趋向也因国度不同而有不同。

sent.orig: Trees vary widely in their habitat.
sent.trans: 在他们的产地树广泛地变化。

sent.orig: User fees or other costs to participate in a computer network system vary considerably.
sent.trans: 用户为加入计算机网系统而付的费用或其它费用差别很大。

sent.orig: Political opinions vary according to wealth, age, etc.
sent.trans: 政治见解因财富、年龄等不同而有所区别。

sent.orig: How could fragments of statues found together off Italy's coast vary so greatly in age?
sent.trans: 从意大利近海岸一起打捞上来的铜像碎片所处年代的差距为什么会这么大呢？
